Program_Policies: The minor consists of 18-20 credits satisfying the requirements below.; A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; Geoscience majors may not double count these courses in their major.
